dcterms:creator: C. H. Lampert
H. Nickisch
S. Harmeling
dcterms:description: The AwA dataset contains 30,475 images with a standard split of 40 seen classes (training set) and 10 unseen classes (test set). Each class has a human-provided 85-dimensional class-attribute vector. The dataset is used to evaluate zero-shot learning models.
dcterms:title: Animals with Attributes (AwA1)

dcterms:creator: Y. Xian
B. Schiele
Z. Akata
dcterms:description: AwA2 is an updated version of the original AwA dataset, which includes raw images and maintains the same structure with 40 seen classes and 10 unseen classes.
dcterms:title: Animals with Attributes (AwA2)

dcterms:creator: P. Welinder
S. Branson
T. Mita
C. Wah
F. Schroff
S. Belongie
P. Perona
dcterms:description: The CUB dataset consists of 200 classes with 11,788 fine-grained images of birds. It is used for zero-shot learning tasks by averaging attributes available at the image level to obtain class-level attributes.
dcterms:title: Caltech UCSD Birds 200 (CUB)

dcterms:creator: J. Xiao
J. Hays
K. A. Ehinger
A. Oliva
A. Torralba
dcterms:description: The SUN dataset comprises 717 scenes and is widely used for zero-shot learning. It contains 14,340 fine-grained images with attributes available at the image level.
dcterms:title: SUN Scene Recognition

dcterms:creator: O. Russakovsky
J. Deng
H. Su
J. Krause
S. Satheesh
S. Ma
Z. Huang
A. Karpathy
A. Khosla
M. S. Bernstein
A. C. Berg
F. Li
dcterms:description: Imagenet is a large-scale visual recognition challenge dataset that includes images from 1000 classes. It is used for zero-shot learning by training on ILSVRC 2012 data and testing on non-overlapping classes from ILSVRC 2010.
dcterms:title: Imagenet
